title: Why now is the time to swap your jeans for leather trousers - and how to make them work for your figure
text:
A standout childhood memory of mine is the day our headmistress wore leather trousers on mufti day. She was always a chic teacher but there was, nevertheless, palpable shock at this departure from polite tailoring as we tried to get through our hymn in the presence of said trousers. She looked fantastic, but that moment encapsulates just what a statement a pair of leather trousers is.

The LT has recently graduated from rebellious staple to fashion key piece and is able to semaphore slick, artful polish. On the catwalks this season,they appeared in countless iterations from high-shine culottes at Celine to slouchy bottle-green slacks at Tod’s and fuchsia varieties at Chanel. But let’s not forget...
